books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the Israeli art restorer and spy, now the head of Israel’s secret intelligence service, pursues an ISIS mastermind
books.name: HOUSE OF SPIES

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: Men and women in a dystopian future. The basis of the Hulu series; originally published in 1985.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: Penny's debut novel, published in 2006, introduces Chief Inspector Armand Gamache of the Sûreté du Québec.
books.name: STILL LIFE

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Complications in the lives of identical twins who were raised by their divorced parents, one on Nantucket, one on Martha’s Vineyard.
books.name: THE IDENTICALS

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering. Basis of the HBO series.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: The counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath is called in when a missing terrorism suspect drowns off the Italian coast.
books.name: USE OF FORCE

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: An expert on serial murder becomes involved in the hunt for a New York City killer who leaves a playing card at the crime scene.
books.name: MURDER GAMES

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The first volume of the Dark Tower series, originally published in 1989.
books.name: THE GUNSLINGER

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: Sunday Night, the heroine of a new series from the creator of Temperance Brennan, searches for a girl who may have been kidnapped by a cult.
books.name: TWO NIGHTS

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: In this psychological thriller by the author of “The Girl on the Train,” drowned women are found in an English river town.
books.name: INTO THE WATER

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Two sisters reconnect in their tulip-centered hometown.
books.name: SECRETS OF THE TULIP SISTERS
